title: Vertex AI - Use the Vertex AI SDK
abstract:
# Vertex AI - Use the Vertex AI SDK
The Vertex AI SDK lets developers to use Google's generative AI [Gemini language models](/vertex-ai/docs/generative-ai/multimodal/overview) and [PaLM language models](/vertex-ai/docs/generative-ai/language-model-overview) to build AI-powered features and applications. The SDKs support use cases like the following:
- Generate text from text, images and video inputs
- Use the [Gemini language multimodal models](/vertex-ai/docs/generative-ai/multimodal/overview) to generate text from text and images input.
The Vertex AI SDK is available for four languages, Python, Go, Java, and Node.js. To learn about each SDK, see the following:
- [Vertex AI SDK for Python](/vertex-ai/docs/python-sdk/use-vertex-ai-python-sdk) - available for Gemini and PaLM
- [Vertex AI Node.js SDK](https://github.com/googleapis/nodejs-vertexai) ( [preview](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages) ) - available for Gemini only
- [Vertex AI Java SDK](https://github.com/googleapis/google-cloud-java/tree/main/java-vertexai) ( [preview](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages) ) - available for Gemini only
- [Vertex AI Go SDK](https://github.com/googleapis/google-cloud-go/tree/main/vertexai) ( [preview](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages) ) - available for Gemini onl
